Name: Trava Finance
Description: TRAVA.FINANCE (or TRAVA) is aÂ decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending. TRAVA.FINANCE offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business. TRAVA.FINANCE is deployed on the Binance Smart Chain and allows for lending with BSC tokens first; we then enable cross-chain lending with various tokens on Ethereum and other blockchain networks.Telegram | Discord | Reddit | Github | Medium | LinkedIn | YoutubeWhitepaper
